text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Forbestown |other_name = |native_name = |nickname = |settlement_type = census-designated place |image_skyline = File:Shalkespeaare Mine Forbestown CA ca1860.jpg |imagesize = 300px |image_caption = Shakespeare Mining & Milling Co, headframe and miners, ca. 1860 |image_map = File:Butte County California Incorporated and Unincorporated areas Forbestown Highlighted 0624750.svg |map_caption = Location of Forbestown in Butte County, California. |pushpin_map = California |pushpin_label_position = bottom |pushpin_mapsize = |pushpin_map_caption = Location in California |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Butte County |subdivision_type3 = |subdivision_name3 = | population_total = 396 | population_as_of = 2020 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_footnotes = | unit_pref = US | area_footnotes = | area_total_sq_mi = 6.280 | area_land_sq_mi = 6.274 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.006 | area_total_km2 = 16.265 | area_land_km2 = 16.250 | area_water_km2 = 0.015 | area_water_percent = 0.09 | area_note = |timezone = Pacific (PST) |utc_offset = -8 |timezone_DST = PDT |utc_offset_DST = -7 | |established_title = |established_date = |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 845 |elevation_ft = 2772 |postal_code_type = ZIP Code |postal_code = |area_code = |blank_name = GNIS feature IDs |blank_info = 1656023; 2612480 |website = |footnotes = , }} Forbestown (formerly Boles Dry Diggins and Forbes Diggins) is a census-designated place (CDP) in Butte County, California. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in California Category:Settlements in Butte County, California
title: Forbestown, California
